Class Circle

java.lang.Object
  Drawable
      Circle

public class Circle
extends Drawable

A circle that can be manipulated and that draws itself on a canvas.

Version:
2011.07.25
Author:
Michael Kolling and David J. Barnes. Modified by AJB.

Constructor Detail

Circle

public Circle()
Constructor for objects of class Circle. New Circle objects are blue and positioned with their centre at (100,150). The initial diameter by default is 40.

Circle

public Circle(int initialDiameter)
Construct a new Circle with a given diameter. New Circle objects are blue and positioned with their centre at (100,150).

Parameters:
initialDiameter - The diameter of the new circle.
Method Detail

changeSize

public void changeSize(int newDiameter)
Change the diameter of the circle to the new size (in pixels).

Parameters:
newDiameter - the new diameter of the circle.

getDiameter

public int getDiameter()
Returns:
the diameter of the circle.
